thread.title: Awami League's Zafar Ali wins Baghaichharhi mayoral elections in new EC's first election
thread.title_full: Awami League's Zafar Ali wins Baghaichharhi mayoral elections in new EC's first election

title: Awami League's Zafar Ali wins Baghaichharhi mayoral elections in new EC's first election
text:
Awami League's Zafar Ali wins Baghaichharhi mayoral elections in new EC's first election Rangamati Correspondent,   19:54:47.0   19:54:47.0 BdST Ruling Awami League candidate Zafar Ali Khan has won Baghaichharhi municipality mayor's post in the first election conducted by the newly formed Election Commission. 
The two other candidates in the election held on Saturday were Omar Ali of the BNP and independent candidate Azizur Rahman Aziz. 
Though Baghaichharhi in Rangamati became a municipality in 2004, the first administrator was selected by appointment. 
Seven years later, independent candidate Alamgir Kabir was elected mayor. He then became a member of the BNP but did not take part in the latest elections due to family problems.
